# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#3)

#### Day 3

"Being married is not so bad, Perrin. Why didn't you tell me it was not so bad? I think I am rather fond of it." (p. 196)
